qas.question: Where were the Estudiantinas active in during the early 20th century?

answers.text: Royal Estudiantina la Napolitaine (founded in 1904) in Antwerp, Brasschaats mandoline orkest in Brasschaat and an orchestra in Mons (Bergen).

qas.question: Where is Gerda Abts well know in?
Where is Gerda Abst a professor mandolin?
Where were the Estudiantinas active in during the early 21st century?
Where is Gerda Abts not well known in?
Where is Gerda Abst not a professor mandolin?

context: In the early 20th century several <a0_0><b5_0>mandolin orchestras<b5_0/><a0_0/> (Estudiantinas) were active in <a1_0><b6_0>Belgium<b6_0/><a1_0/>. Today only a few groups remain: <a2_0><b7_0>Royal Estudiantina la Napolitaine<b7_0/> (founded in 1904) in Antwerp, Brasschaats mandoline orkest in Brasschaat and an orchestra in Mons (Bergen).<a2_0/> Gerda Abts is a well known mandolin virtuoso in <a3_0><b8_0>Belgium<b8_0/><a3_0/>. She is also mandolin teacher and gives lessons in the music academies of Lier, Wijnegem and Brasschaat. She is now also professor mandolin at the music high school “<a4_0><b9_0>Koninklijk Conservatorium Artesis Hogeschool Antwerpen<b9_0/><a4_0/>”. She also gives various concerts each year in different ensembles. She is in close contact to the Brasschaat mandolin Orchestra. Her site is www.gevoeligesnaar.be
